content.description: From big jug sit start, crank up to a right facing side pull, bump to a crimp, finish up and over the small boulder.
content.location: Facing girls of Juarez, this small boulder is to the left.

content.description:
Start on the same jug as "Girls of Texas" and work your way right to a 3 finger gaston pocket for the right hand.  Make a big move to a sharp crimp for the left, then a sharp crimp for the right.  Continue up the boulder on easier ground a good amount of choss. 

  I imagine this line has been done before being on North in an area that sees alot of traffic, but there was not chalk on it when I did it.  Pretty fun line with good movement, but the sharp and chossy holds keep it from being more stars.  If all the holds stay it will probably be better than "Girls of Texas"
content.location: Start on the same jug as "Girls of Texas" then traverses right for a few moves then heads straight up.

content.description: Really fun climb starting on a undercling. Make a big move to the lip match and awkwadrly mantle the slab, careful not to hit your head though! Short but sweet!
content.protection: Pads and spotters, landing is pretty decent
content.location: When you enter this area this climb is on the left side of the wall directly in front of you, to the left of Black Mamba V10
obvious chalked up line down and right from the start of Girls of jaurez

content.description: Start matched on the low slopey pinch hold down and right. Make a big move to the lip and mantle it out. Fun little one-move-wonder lowball.
content.location: As you walk into the corridor hosting Girls of Juarez, there is a short wave-like boulder straight ahead. This starts low on the right side and tops out the crest.

content.description: Position yourself on the starting jug holds and throw a heel up on the huge ledge.  Move the left hand to a small sharp crimp and make a hard stab for a slightly larger sharp crimp.  Latch this move the right hand up and grab another sharp crimp.  From here the difficulty eases as you can get alot of weight on your feet but things remain tricky until your fully on top.  Fun moves but quite sharp on uninspiring holds.
content.location: On the aptly named Girls of Texas boulder.  Look for a large starting jug and thin chalked crimps above leading to a rounded topout.  You will be facing the Girls of Juarez  problem when approaching the climb.

content.description: Start on an adjacent rock on a huge flake.  This rock is considered on for both hands and feet.  From the flake work your way out underneath the capstone on mostly good holds utilizing toe and heel hooks.  As you approach the end of the capstone grab good holds over the lip and pull up onto the boulder.
content.protection: Several pads and spotters.  The landing zone is very uneven and a out of control fall would not be good from any point on the problem.
content.location:
In the Girls of Juarez cave area, formed by a large capstone. 

  Step off right for the descent.

content.description: Start sitting on the right hand wall on thin holds. Pull some moves then go out the roof to join Girls in the middle.
Start on pinches and move up and left to top
content.location: Below and left of the start of Girls of Juarez.. An unusual looking black streak marks the line

content.description: Cold and shady, gets dark ealier than other areas so be sure to stop here first.
